title: Flex queue is a fucking joke.
body: Just fix the fucking matchmaking, Diamonds and Bronze players should no be queing together, there is no excuse for that. You're a billion dollar company, so start acting like one.

replies.body:
well i mean, flex being a joke is because every player treats it like a joke, not the company faults, they said it would have it's own seperate mmr, and it does.


Stop being upset that you suck and get good at the game instead of blaming the company for your sorry plays.
